sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function F10() { return (

An argument

  • The only way to get the best out of an argument is to avoid it
  • 9 times out of 10 an argument ends with each of the contestants more firmly convinced than ever that he is firmly right
  • You can’t win an argument because, if you lose it you lose it and if you win it you lose it
  • If you win an argument you would have made him feel inferior and hurt his pride. He will resent your triumph
  • You may achieve a victory sometimes but it will be empty because you will never get your opponent’s good will
  • How to prevent a disagreement from becoming an argument?
  • If there is some point you haven’t talked about be thankful if it is brought to your attention
  • Perhaps this disagreement is your opportunity to be corrected before you make a serious mistake
  • Keep calm and watch out for your first reaction it may be you at your worst
) }
